string.value: VAGRANT| No good thing is called a debt... Bring the parcel to the other side of the world. Earn on the trifling 500 coins. And this is only because I am indebted to the mechanic for the rescue of my truck.

VAGRANT| Debt is good when it is paid off. My payment is good 400 miles in the desert. Mountains to the left; steppe to the right... Or mountains to the right and steppe to the left - that is diversity. Such beauty makes me feel sick.
VAGRANT| And at the end of my travel I am in the small town of Jericho. I doubt if a man can find a decent bar here...
HARLEQUIN| Take your time, vagrant!
VAGRANT| And who are you?
HARLEQUIN| You are on the Wolf Track now. We are the Dogs, vagrant, and we do not like strangers that smell of troubles miles away. You'd better turn back unless you're looking for problems.
VAGRANT| I am on business in this town.
HARLEQUIN| Dogs, our guest doesn't seem to understand the local customs. Be friendly and explain it to him
FIGHTER| OK Boss
HARLEQUIN| Bye-bye, stranger.
VAGRANT| You again?
HARLEQUIN| It's high time we had a serious conversation...
VAGRANT| Get in the truck... I will not shoot a man without a vehicle.
HARLEQUIN| You'll pay for your impudence.
VAGRANT| Is there someone else who wants to greet me in your town?.. No? Buy-buy, puppies.

KITTY|Hello, handsome. Now you won't even be able to get gas in our area. Arelequin was the right hand of Bulldog, the Boss of Dogs. As long as you are an enemy of Dogs, no one is stupid enough to help you.
VAGRANT|All that's left is to steal spare parts and drain gasoline at night.

KITTY|As an option. Option number two - work for Garfield's Cats. If you work for Garfield, you will have both money and gas. You can find him at his Villa. Say that Kitty sent you. Good luck, Handsome.
VAGRANT|Thank you.
EGOIST| Get out of my way, dummy.
VAGRANT| Hold your tongue.
EGOIST| This is the stranger who shot Harlequin. Now a war will start because of you.
VAGRANT| What's your problem? Your enemies become weaker.
EGOIST| You are a stranger. We don't want you here
VAGRANT| Do not run into troubles. It is not up to you.
EGOIST| I hear threat in your voice?!
VAGRANT| So what?
EGOIST| Don't you know I'll kill you cad.
VAGRANT| Any questions?
EGOIST| You will pay for this...
VAGRANT| We'll live you'll see... If you want me to, I'll stick around the town.
VAGRANT| Do you need a hand?
DRIVER| Everybody will be glad to have a hand. Aren't you that driver who killed Harlequin?
VAGRANT| You seem to confuse me with someone else...
DRIVER| I guess I am right...
GUARD| Hey, dude, get off the road.
VAGRANT| The Cats sent me with a message...
GUARD| What message?
VAGRANT| I've got your payment right here...guys, fire!
VAGRANT| Damn it. I will have another road to get back...
VAGRANT| Hello guys. Having a nice rest?
EGOIST| Stop, don't kill...
VAGRANT| Go in my vehicle... Just move and you're dead.
CHIEF CAT| You are to pay for this...
BORN| Where's our freight?!
CHIEF CAT| Show me this Egotist first.
BORN| He's allright - take him?
CHIEF CAT| This is a wrong box!!!
BORN| Fire!!!
CHIEF CAT| Die puppies!!!
VAGRANT| Hello guys. Waiting for anybody?
BORN| What's going on here?
VAGRANT| The Dogs have obviously got new fighters... When I arrived, everything was over.
KEVIN| And what is wrong with your vehicle?
VAGRANT| I ran at a dog
KEVIN| We did not see any on the road.
VAGRANT| Did anybody disassemble it for spares?
KEVIN| I don't think so. The driver was neither a Dog nor a Cat; he is a filthy rat. Take the weapon from his vehicle.
VAGRANT| Damn it.
CHIEF CAT| How could you let him escape?! Catch him now!!!
CHIEF CAT| Where is he?! Max, Fleming - you stay here; others go with me.
MAX| Here it is!!!
FLEMING| Catch it!!!
VAGRANT| Seems like he's gone. We'd better get to the Church - there, we could stay until everything is allright.
PRIEST| A guest to you Vagrant. It is Mayor.
MAYOR| You have done everything excellently - one of the bands ceased to exist. What are you going to do next?
VAGRANT| I need to repair the vehicle and get myself weapons first.
MAYOR| I would not help you for any price... And I won't. I'll only give you weapon. The Dogs captured Joe. I don't want anything to happen to him.
VAGRANT| Are they in Jericho?
MAYOR| Yes, in the Eastern side. Born and Kevin went to look for Kitty - only plain fighters are left...
KEVIN| Well-done! May be you are even as good as I am.
VAGRANT| Judging by rumours, I don't think so...
KEVIN| Rumors are usually exaggerated...

BORN| Listen! I don't want a war. We don't need to fight. The war is over - and we've won. Why shall we fight? We must be happy! Vagrant, join me. We'll find Kitty together; I've got money. Everything's gonna be allright! We've won!
VAGRANT| I don't think Kevin and I are going the same way...
JOE| Take that!!!

VAGRANT| So that's the end of the story... The town of Jericho was destroyed. The local population, who hated gangs, could not live in the town without money of the gangs and soon everybody left. Born's money was not found, either. The Cats' treasures burned together with their Houses.

VAGRANT| I spent the rest of my cash to have my vehicle repaired and set out on my journey. A drunkard in the bar blabbed out about a truck with a valuable freight that furrowed local country as a modest merchant. It would be stupid of me to waste such a chance...
VAGRANT| It does not look like I can get through here. There must be some other way.
Do you want to leave this area?
VAGRANT| I do not know where the road leads to. That is why I am staying here.
БРОДЯГА|Какое-то странное место. Лучше держаться отсюда подальше.
